questions.question_text: What is one of the key features of Cognitive Intelligence?

choices.B: It enables greater threat intelligence with entity modeling
choices.A: Allows visibility into anonymous and encrypted communications
choices.D: It enhances anonymity with URL filtering
choices.C: It enables safe email usage with event analytics

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
@16:56 Security AM Module 7 and SE Module 9 Securing Next-Generation Networks

Selected Answer: A
A is correct.
B is the correct answer

Using machine learning and a statistical modeling of networks, Cognitive Intelligence creates a baseline of normal activity and identifies anomalous traffic occurring within your network. It analyzes device behavior and web traffic to pinpoint command-and-control communications and data exfiltration.
visibility is a benefit but Entity modeling is a feature
